pr_title: KOGITO-2431: Fixed snapshots related to DE

timeline.message: KOGITO-2431: Fixed snapshots related to DE
KOGITO-2431: Fixed snapshots related to DE

timeline.bodyText:
I would maybe keep this test as the only one that actually uses the patternfly table component and mock in the rest.
The goal is to make the snapshot shorter - this way we make sure that the component renders fine with default props and then in other snapshots just focus on the behavior (often it is emtpy-state vs. table rednered - but we don't need to see the contents of the table, it is enough to see that table component is being used)
timeline.author: jstastny-cz

timeline.bodyText: here I am still not clear on the description of the test, one is Boolean assertions-false, second Boolean assertions-true - what is the difference?
timeline.author: jstastny-cz

replies.bodyText: Hum, the snapshots for the two tests are identical, just differ based on passed values (state COMPLETED vs. PENDING in one process instance). So unless there's some reason I am missing I would remove both the snapshots, cause they're identical also to Snapshot test with default props. If this is due to coverage - we might need to test differently - cause there's nothing interesting in the resulting snapshot.
replies.author: jstastny-cz

replies.bodyText: This is made as one single snapshot tests all state values
replies.author: Sara4994

timeline.bodyText: is empty-state in snapshot here expected?
timeline.author: jstastny-cz

replies.bodyText: @jstastny-cz yes it is, as per the condition provided.
replies.author: Sara4994

timeline.bodyText: Should zero offset result in empty-state? Or needs the test to be fixed?
timeline.author: jstastny-cz

replies.bodyText: This is fixed, now it renders table not empty-state
replies.author: Sara4994

timeline.bodyText: can we try mocking LoadMore too?
timeline.author: jstastny-cz
jstastny-cz

timeline.bodyText: I think we can mock all the icons used here, it'll save some space in snapshots.
timeline.author: jstastny-cz
